text:
April 21, 1955
Lt. Richard L. Spears
Office Information Services
Air Weather Service
Military Air Transport Service
United States Air Force
Washington 25, D.C.
Dear Lb. Spears:
In a preliminary way, I would indicate a
special interest in the proposed series on meteorology
and climatology. However, we have both program
planning and acceptance committees for our NAE8
radio network on whose recommendations we operate.
Therefore, I am making a fast survey of committee
members before giving you a formal reaction to your
letter of April lit. You will hear from me shortly.
Sincerely yours.
FES:Js
Frank E. Schooley
President
